headline: 1 Insurance Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Find Risky
summary: Insurance providers use their expertise in risk assessment to help protect assets while offering consumers peace of mind through comprehensive coverage options. Still, investors are uneasy as insurers face challenges from catastrophic events and potential regulatory changes. These doubts have certainly contributed to insurance stocks’ recent underperformance - over the past six months, the industry’s 6.1% gain has fallen behind the S&P 500’s 29.3% rise.

headline: Is There Opportunity in AIG After Latest 5% Pullback in 2025?
summary: Trying to decide what to do with American International Group stock? You are in good company, and you are right to look beyond just the headline numbers. AIG's share price has bounced between optimism and skepticism lately. After falling 4.8% over the past week, the stock is still up 6.0% year-to-date and has delivered an impressive 168.5% return over the last five years. That kind of trajectory gets the attention of both long-haul investors and those eyeing shorter-term trends. It is clear...
